animeTitle: My Junior Sisters Are Obsessed With Me
otherNames: My Junior Sisters Are Obsessed With Me, El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere, Fanpai Da Shixiong Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao, Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo, Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh Các Sư Muội Tất C
synopsis: Lin Xiao space-travels and becomes the villainous senior brother of Verdant Sect! As long as he follows the original storyline and plays the disgusting antagonist, he can ascend to immortality! Left with no other option, he has to tease his three junior sisters, sneakily steal their clothes, and discreetly slip drugs into their water, diligently fulfilling his villainous duties. After all the waiting, Lin Xiao is over the moon that the male protagonist, Ye Chen, finally joins the sect, and he plans to poison Ye Chen. According to the plot, he'll be caught by his junior sisters and be thoroughly humiliated by Ye Chen! But unexpectedly...
